full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BAR DO'I 'PHRANG SGROL GYI GSOL 'DEBS KYI SGO NAS MKHA' SPYOD SOGS SU SKYE BA'I 'DUN PA BSKYED TSUL GDAMS PA'I RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,('DI NI PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL POS MDZAD PA'I BAR DO 'PHRANG SGROL GYI GSOL 'DEBS LA GZHI BYAS TE BKOD PA YIN PAS, DE DANG BSTUN NAS MKHA' SPYOD DU SKYE BA'I 'DUN PA BSKYED TSUL DANG SBYAR BA YIN LA, ZHED KHAMS GZHAN DU SKYE BA'I 'DUN PA GTOR NA ZHING DE'I BKOD PA YID LA BYED TSUL SOGS GZHAN NAS 'BYUNG BA LTAR BYA ZHING, DE'ANG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI YAN LAG TU BYED CING, RANG NYID YI DAM GANG LA BYED PA DE'I GSOL 'DEBS KYI MJUG TU SBYAR TE, DON DRAN BZHIN PAS NYAMS SUU BLANGS NA 'CHI DKA'I GDAMS PA'I RGYAL POR 'GYUR BAR GSUNGS PAS, BDAG LEGS SU 'DOD PA RNAMS KYIS CES KYANG LAG LEN DU 'THEBS PA GAL CHE'O, ,)
